title: Activate menubar switches mode from reading to interaction
task: activate menubar in reading mode
instructions: activate the 'Text Formatting' menubar
assertion1: Screen reader switching to interaction mode is conveyed

title: Navigation to menubar switches mode from reading to interaction mode
task: tab to menubar in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the link just before the meunbar
instructions: navigate to the 'Text Formatting' menubar
assertion1: Screen reader switching to interaction mode is conveyed

title: Navigation to menubar using reading mode
task: navigate to menubar in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the link just before the meunbar
instructions: navigate to the 'Text Formatting' menubar
assertion1: The role 'menubar' is conveyed
assertion2: The menubar label 'Text Formatting' is conveyed
assertion3: Number of items in menubar is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item in menubar using reading mode
task: navigate to menuitem in menubar using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Font' menu item
instructions: navigate to 'Style/Color' menu
assertion1: The role 'menu item' is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The menubar label 'Text Formatting' is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item in menubar using interaction mode
task: navigate to menuitem in menubar using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Font' menu item
instructions: navigate to 'Style/Color' menu
assertion1: The role 'menu item' is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The menubar label 'Text Formatting' is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item radio in submenu using reading mode
task: navigate to menuitemradio in submenu using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Open 'Font' menu item and move focus to the 'Font' menu item
instructions: navigate to 'Sans-serif' menu item in the 'Font' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item radio in submenu using interaction mode
task: navigate to menuitemradio in submenu using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Font' menu item
instructions: navigate to 'Sans-serif' menu item in the 'Font' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item checkbox in submenu using reading mode
task: navigate to menuitemcheckbox in submenu using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Text Align' menuitem and give the 'Text ALign' menu item focus
instructions: navigate to 'Bold' menu item in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Navigate to menu item checkbox�in interaction mode
task: navigate to menuitemcheckbox in submenu using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Style/Color' menu item
instructions: navigate to 'Bold' menu item in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Change state of menu item radio to checked
task: change state of menuitemradio in submenu using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Style/Color' menu item and move focus to the 'Blue' menu item radio option
instructions: check the 'Blue' menu item in the 'Style/Color'sub menu
assertion1: The checked state of the checkbox is conveyed
assertion2: Screen reader switching to interaction mode is conveyed

title: Change state of menu item radio�to�checked
task: change state of menuitemradio in submenu using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Style/Color' menu item and move focus to the 'Blue' menu item radio option
instructions: check the 'Blue' menu item in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The checked state of the checkbox is conveyed

title: Change state of menu item checkbox to checked in reading mode
task: change state of menuitemcheckbox in submenu using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Style/Color' menu item and move focus to the 'Italic' menu item checkbox option
instructions: check the 'Italic' menu item in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The checked state of the checkbox is conveyed
assertion2: Screen reader switching to interaction mode is conveyed

title: Change state of menu item checkbox to checked in interaction mode
task: change state of menuitemcheckbox in submenu using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Style/Color' menu item and move focus to the 'Italic' menu item checkbox option
instructions: check the 'Italic' menu item in the 'Style/Color'sub menu
assertion1: The checked state of the checkbox is conveyed

title: Change state of menu item checkbox to unchecked in reading mode
task: change state of menuitemcheckbox in submenu using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Style/Color' menu item and move focus to the 'Italic' menu item checkbox option
instructions: uncheck the 'Italic' menu item in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The unchecked state of the checkbox is conveyed
assertion2: Screen reader switching to interaction mode is conveyed

title: Change state of menu item checkbox to unchecked in interaction mode
task: change state of menuitemcheckbox in submenu using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Style/Color' menu item and move focus to the 'Italic' menu item checkbox option
instructions: uncheck the 'Italic' menu item in the 'Style/Color' menu
assertion1: The unchecked state of the checkbox is conveyed

title: Open submenu in reading mode
task: open submenu of menubar using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
instructions: opens 'Text Align' submenu and move focus to 'Left' menu item
assertion1: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Open submenu in interaction mode
task: open submenu of menubar using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Text Align' menu item
instructions: opens 'Text Align' submenu and focus moves to 'Left' menu item
assertion1: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Close submenu in reading mode
task: close submenu of menubar using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Text Align' menu item and move focus to the 'Left' menu item checkbox option
instructions: Closes 'Text Align' submenu and moves focus to 'Text Align' menu item
assertion1: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion6: 2: The position and size of the menubar  is conveyed

title: Close submenu in interaction mode
task: close submenu of menubar using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Text Align' menu item and move focus to the 'Left' menu item checkbox option
instructions: Closes 'Text Align' submenu and moves focus to 'Text Align' menu item
assertion1: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion6: 2: The position and size of the menubar  is conveyed

title: Read menu item in menubar in reading mode
task: read menu item in menubar using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Size' menu item
instructions: Review the  'Size' menu item in the menubar
assertion1: The role 'menu item' is conveyed
assertion5: 3: The menubar label 'Text Formatting' is conveyed

title: Read menu item in menubar in interaction mode
task: read menu item in menubar using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: Move focus to the 'Size' menu item
instructions: Review the  'Size' menu item in the menubar
assertion1: The role 'menu item' is conveyed
assertion5: 3: The menubar label 'Text Formatting' is conveyed

title: Read menu item radio button in submenu in reading mode
task: read menuitemradio in a group in submenu using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Style/Color' menu item and move focue to the 'Black' menu item radio option
instructions: Review the  'Black' menu item radio in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The group label 'Text Color' is conveyed

task: read menuitemradio in a group in a submenu using interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Style/Color' menu item and move focue to the 'Black' menu item radio option
instructions: Review the  'Blue' menu item radio in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
assertion5: 2: The group label 'Text Color' is conveyed

instructions: Review the 'Bold' menu item in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

task: read menuitemcheckbox in a submenu using interaction mode

instructions: Review the 'Bold' menu item in the 'Style/Color' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item checkbox' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

title: Read disabled menu item in submenu in reading mode
task: read disabled menuitem in a submenu using reading mode
setupScriptDescription: open 'Size' menu item and disable the 'Larger' option and move focus to the 'Larger' menu item checkbox option
instructions: Review the 'Larger' menu item in the 'Size' submenu
assertion1: The role 'menu item' is conveyed
assertion4: 2: The position and size of the submenu  is conveyed

task: read disabled menuitem in a submenu using interaction mode

instructions: Review the 'Larger' menu item in the 'Size' submenu
